answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.Normal creatinine clearance values in males is 107-139 milliliters per minute. High creatinine clearance values can be caused by strenuous exercise, muscle injury, burns, carbon monoxide poisoning and hypothyroidism. Discuss these options with your consulting doctor.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.

question: Hi,My Father, 55 years, has been suffering from Diabetes for over 15 years.  Recently, He took his blood tests and found that his CreatinineCreatinine clearancelevel has shot up to 3.20mgs/dl
title: is there any madicine of decrease creatine in homeopathy?
